item.title: What is The Interplanetary File System: A High Level Guide
item.description: IPFS is designed as a content-addressed, versioned, peer-to-peer file system.

item.title: The Great Ethereum merge.
item.description: Ethereum switched from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake to stop alot of energy consumption.
